Reviews.Title: Thank god!
Reviews.Author: Sarah Anderson
Reviews.Content: With no insurance available for when your iphone is stolen and new phones starting at $500, thank god I found this deal to replace my iphone. looks and works great!

Reviews.Title: I bought an iPhone 32gb
Reviews.Author: Tyesha L Anthony
Reviews.Content: I normally do not shop on-line. I was pleased it was exactly what I expected.  "Brand new - in the box". I love my new phone!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT WORKING PHONE
Reviews.Author: THAT954BOY "LEO"
Reviews.Content: EVEN THOUGH I HAD TO WAIT ALMOST A WEEK TO GET BUT IT WAS SURE WORTH I LOVE THE PHONE

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Bre
Reviews.Content: I would buy from this seller again, product is great and works just as described! I was skeptical on spending so much money on something i had never seen and didnt know what kind of condition it would be in but i am thoroughly satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: mchannah
Reviews.Content: Overall this is a great phone. It's pretty much identical to any other Apple product in terms of software and hardware. Response touch screen and decent call quality. The battery tends to last for a full day if you remember to turn of the WiFi and Bluetooth when you're not using them.

Reviews.Title: It`s very good
Reviews.Author: James Yanagida
Reviews.Content: local sprint store did`t have micro SIM card so I called sprint toll fee number to get it. It is very seasonable price. thank you.

Reviews.Title: Love my new phone
Reviews.Author: Karen Bartlett "WhtTger"
Reviews.Content: So much space on it. Came a day before planned. Cme new in an unopened package. Great fast service, was able to track it step by step

Reviews.Title: Phone was great
Reviews.Author: L L "private shopper"
Reviews.Content: Got this to replace a broken 4S.  Great phone, does everything I need and probably more.  I have room for music, all the apps I have for medical education reasons, bluetooth to hook up with my car, no problems.  Really like it.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Breen
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement phone, it was in great condition could not tell it had ever been used. It was a breeze getting it turned on as well.

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT I ORDERED
Reviews.Author: Selita
Reviews.Content: This says 4s 32gb Sprint and that's what I expected when I ordered but it came in an iPhone 4 AT&T; box. It didn't even come with a SIM if it was from AT&T; and I am VERY disappointed.
